Texto: 
afebrile
negative physical examination
negative blood cultures
negative cardiac ultrasound
surgery and iv antibiotics
• ring enhancing lesion in the right temporal lobe.
• low signal intensity rim on t2 sequences.
• high signal on dwi images.
brain, cerebral abscess, staph. aureus
• abscess
• astrocytoma
• metastatic disease
• hematoma
50 year old woman with two week history of headache.
because this patient was afebrile, finding a lesion consistent with an abscess was unexpected.
